players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is dead. I investigated Diana last night and found her to be the mafioso. We need to vote her out."
Diana: "That's a lie, Alice. I'm the detective and I investigated you last night - you're the mafioso trying to frame me."
Charlie: "Alice, Diana, this is a classic he-said-she-said. One of you is lying. We need to hear more to break this tie."
Charlie: "Alice, if you're the real detective, why did you investigate Diana instead of Bob? That seems like an odd first choice when we had no info."
Diana: "Charlie, think about it: if I were mafia, why would I kill Bob and leave two people to challenge me? Alice is lying to save herself. Vote Alice."

You: "Diana is lying. As the detective, I had no prior information about anyone, so I chose Diana. Her claim to have investigated me is a desperate attempt to deflect. Bob's death and Diana's accusation are too convenient. Vote Diana."
